subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Ashton Gibbs scored 24 points and Jermaine Dixon added 21 to lead Pittsburgh to a victory over host Syracuse, reducing the number of major unbeaten teams to four.
snippet: Ashton Gibbs scored 24 points and Jermaine Dixon added 21 to lead Pittsburgh to a victory over host Syracuse, reducing the number of major unbeaten teams to four.
